title: Media-integrated microlearning for understanding organizational behavior principles

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Accessing everyday organizational scenarios through media while applying foundational data analysis using mathematics

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three core principles (e.g., power structures, communication patterns, motivation theories) explaining organizational decision-making processes with case examples.
Learners can mathematically model organizational behavior issues (graphs/statistics) and propose solutions using provided media content.
Learners can diagnose real organizational problems through team projects and develop improvement plans applying learned principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
